description: Customers in the Upper Midwest were in the dark on Saturday after snow and ice hit the region this week, resulting in one death.
title: More Than 465,000 Still Without Power in Michigan After Snowstorm
title_page: Winter Storm Causes Power Outages in the Midwest: Weather Updates - The New York Times
maintext:
More Than 465,000 Still Without Power in Michigan After Snowstorm
Customers in the Upper Midwest were in the dark on Saturday after snow and ice hit the region this week, resulting in one death.

Mitch Wengrzynowicz, who lost power at his home in Dearborn, Mich., tries to stay warm on Friday. Credit... Paul Sancya/Associated Press
